text: Gisèle Casadesus (14 June 1914 - 24 September 2017) was a French actress. She was known for her roles in Du Guesclin, Verdict, The Children of the Marshland, What Love May Bring, and in My Afternoons with Marguerite. She was an honorary member of the Sociétaires of the Comédie-Française, Grand Officer of the Legion of Honor, Officer of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres, and Grand-Croix of the National Order of Merit. Her career has lasted for nearly 80 years. Casadesus died on 24 September 2017 in Paris of respiratory failure at the age of 103.Gisèle Casadesus, doyenne des actrices françaises, est décédée à 103 ans ==References== ==Other websites== * * The Casadesus Family * Gisèle Casadesus at the Comédie-Française Category:1914 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Paris Category:French centenarians Category:French movie actors
title: Gisèle Casadesus
